trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents the database column that a property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column the property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the column the property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column the property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the zero-based order of the column the property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the database provider specific data type of the column the property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The database provider specific data type of the column the property is mapped to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx.$$x$$x
